) const [virtual]

Definition at line 1688 of file Octree.cpp.

References Elem_geom::contient(), Objet_U::dimension, num_elem, ArrOfInt::size_array(), sz, Zone::type_elem(), and Octree::zone().

{
  int sz=num_elem.size_array();
  int element=-1;
  const Elem_geom& elemgeom=zone().type_elem();
  ArrOfDouble pos(Objet_U::dimension);
  pos(0)=x;
  if(Objet_U::dimension>1) pos(1)=y;
  if(Objet_U::dimension>2) pos(2)=z;
  int trouve=0;
  int ielem=0;
  while((ielem < sz) && (trouve==0))
    {
      if(elemgeom.contient(pos,num_elem(ielem)))
        {
          element=num_elem(ielem);
          if(element >= prems)
            trouve=1;
          else
            ielem++;
        }
      else
        ielem++;
    }
  if(ielem>=sz)
    {
      element=-1;
    }
  return element;
}

Definition at line 1630 of file Octree.cpp.

References Elem_geom::contient(), Objet_U::dimension, num_elem, ArrOfInt::size_array(), sz, Zone::type_elem(), and Octree::zone().

{
  int sz=num_elem.size_array();
  int element=-1;
  const Elem_geom& elemgeom=zone().type_elem();
  ArrOfDouble pos(Objet_U::dimension);
  pos(0)=x;
  if(Objet_U::dimension>1) pos(1)=y;
  if(Objet_U::dimension>2) pos(2)=z;
  for (int ielem = 0; ielem < sz; ielem++)
    {

      if(elemgeom.contient(pos,num_elem(ielem)))
        {
          element=num_elem(ielem);
          break;
        }
      else
        {
// Process::Journal() << "PAS TROUVE !!: " <<  finl;
        }
    }
  return element;
}
